example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (PP-PRD (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN امكان) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا)))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نتأكد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (PUNC ,) (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P راجعنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تاريخ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكنيسة))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مختلف) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN بلدان) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العالم))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: if we reviewed the church history in different countries in the world

example.arg: إذا راجعنا تاريخ الكنيسة في مختلف بلدان العالم
